title: Push-Ups
description: Full-body exercise targeting chest, triceps, and shoulders. Great for building upper body strength.

title: Pull-Ups
description: Upper body workout focusing on back and biceps. Requires lifting your body weight using a bar.

title: Squats
description: Lower body exercise strengthening thighs, hips, and buttocks. Essential for leg muscle development.

title: Lunges
description: Leg workout that targets quads, hamstrings, and glutes. Improves balance and coordination.

imageAlt: Photo of someone doing calf raises
title: Calf Raises
description: Exercise to strengthen and tone calf muscles. Done by lifting heels off the ground.

imageAlt: Photo of someone doing a plank
title: Plank
description: Core strengthening exercise holding a push-up position. Engages abs, back, and shoulders.

imageAlt: Photo of someone doing jumping jacks
title: Jumping Jacks
description: Cardio exercise involving jumping with arms and legs spread wide. Boosts heart rate

title: Skipping
description: High-intensity cardio using a jump rope. Enhances agility, coordination, and endurance.

title: Dips
description: Tricep and chest workout performed on parallel bars or a bench. Strengthens upper body.

title: Crunches
description: Abdominal exercise focusing on the rectus abdominis. Effective for core strength.

imageAlt: Photo of someone doing bicep curls
title: Bicep Curls
description: Arm exercise using weights to target the biceps. Enhances arm strength and muscle tone.

imageAlt: Photo of someone doing tricep curls
title: Tricep Curls
description: Isolated movement focusing on tricep muscles. Often performed with dumbbells.

imageAlt: Photo of someone doing leg raises
title: Leg Raises
description: Core exercise targeting lower abdominal muscles. Performed lying down, lifting legs.

title: Speed Walking
description: Cardiovascular activity walking briskly. Boosts heart health and burns calories.

title: Running
description: High-intensity cardio for endurance and cardiovascular health. Burns significant calories.

title: Cycling
description: Low-impact cardio exercise improving leg strength and endurance. Great for heart health.

title: Swimming
description: Full-body workout enhancing cardiovascular fitness. Low-impact and joint-friendly.
